statements: SELECT * FROM neural_network_weights;
SELECT layer_name, weight_matrix FROM neural_network_weights WHERE updated_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT layer_name FROM neural_network_weights ORDER BY layer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM neural_network_weights WHERE layer_name LIKE 'dense%';
SELECT layer_name, COUNT(*) AS num_weights FROM neural_network_weights GROUP BY layer_name HAVING num_weights > 100;
SELECT * FROM neural_network_weights WHERE layer_name = 'input' ORDER BY updated_at DESC;
SELECT layer_name, COUNT(*) FROM neural_network_weights GROUP BY layer_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT layer_name, AVG(length(weight_matrix)) AS avg_length FROM neural_network_weights GROUP BY layer_name ORDER BY avg_length DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT layer_name FROM neural_network_weights WHERE updated_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
SELECT layer_name, SUM(octet_length(weight_matrix)) AS total_bytes FROM neural_network_weights GROUP BY layer_name ORDER BY total_bytes DESC;
SELECT * FROM neural_network_weights WHERE layer_num = 1;
SELECT weight_value, layer_num FROM neural_network_weights ORDER BY weight_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM neural_network_weights WHERE layer_num > 2;
SELECT weight_value, layer_num FROM neural_network_weights ORDER BY layer_num ASC;
SELECT weight_id, weight_value FROM neural_network_weights WHERE layer_num = 3;
SELECT * FROM neural_network_weights WHERE layer_num = 2 ORDER BY weight_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM neural_network_weights WHERE weight_value > 0.5;
SELECT update_id, new_weight_value FROM training_updates JOIN neural_network_weights ON training_updates.updated_weight_id = neural_network_weights.weight_id WHERE iteration_num = 10;
SELECT AVG(weight_value) AS average_weight FROM neural_network_weights;
SELECT layer_num, COUNT(weight_id) AS weight_count FROM neural_network_weights GROUP BY layer_num HAVING COUNT(weight_id) > 3;
SELECT * FROM neural_network_weights WHERE layer_id = 1;
SELECT layer_id, weight_matrix FROM neural_network_weights ORDER BY layer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_data WHERE data_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT data_id, input_data, target_data FROM training_data WHERE data_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT log_id, start_time, end_time, loss FROM training_logs ORDER BY loss ASC;
SELECT * FROM neural_network_weights ORDER BY layer_id DESC;
SELECT data_id, target_data FROM training_data WHERE data_id > 100 ORDER BY data_id ASC;
SELECT layer_id, LENGTH(weight_matrix) AS matrix_length FROM neural_network_weights WHERE layer_id = 3;
SELECT AVG(loss) AS average_loss, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM start_time) AS start_year FROM training_logs GROUP BY start_year;
SELECT data_id, input_data, target_data FROM training_data WHERE target_data IS NOT NULL ORDER BY data_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM neural_network_weights;
SELECT layer_name, weight_matrix FROM neural_network_weights ORDER BY layer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, data FROM training_data WHERE data IS NOT NULL;
SELECT parameter_name, value FROM model_parameters WHERE value > 0.5 ORDER BY parameter_name;
SELECT * FROM neural_network_weights WHERE layer_name = 'hidden_layer';
SELECT layer_name, weight_matrix FROM neural_network_weights ORDER BY weight_matrix DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_data WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 5);
SELECT parameter_name, AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM model_parameters GROUP BY parameter_name;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, message FROM training_logs WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_data
SELECT sample_id, features, label FROM training_data
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM model_parameters
SELECT layer_id, neuron_id, weight FROM neural_network_weights
SELECT epoch, loss FROM training_progress
SELECT * FROM neural_network_weights ORDER BY layer_id DESC, neuron_id ASC
SELECT features, label FROM training_data WHERE label='positive'
SELECT parameter_id, parameter_name, parameter_value FROM model_parameters WHERE parameter_value > 0.5
SELECT * FROM training_progress WHERE loss < 0.1 ORDER BY epoch DESC
SELECT layer_name, activation_function FROM model_architecture WHERE activation_function='relu'
